fields.name: anchor
fields.description: Anchor type - where this displays on page

fields.name: scaling
fields.description: Scale type - whether box should scale with viewport

fields.name: nineslice
fields.description: Nineslice - will be stretched to form backer for box

fields.name: typeSpeed
fields.description: Text autotype speed - in characters per second

fields.name: typeRefKey
fields.description: Type sfx reference key - plays once per character autotyped,corresponds to entry in sound manager, or empty

fields.name: marginWidth
fields.description: Margin width - Pixel amount on each side from edge of the screen

fields.name: marginTop
fields.description: Margin top - Pixel amount on top from edge of the screen

fields.name: marginBottom
fields.description: Margin bottom - Pixel amount on bottom from edge of the screen

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
